root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 5-1-3, translated into en
root.data: Goal 5. Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls5.1 End all forms of discrimination against women and girls everywhere5.1.3. % women occupying decision-making positions (Minister, Provincial Governor and Municipal Administrator)GOVERNMENT SECRETARIATGovernment websiteThis is the proportion of women ministers, governors and municipal administrators.%Government websiteConsultation of the bulletin or the Government websiteN / AN / AN / AN / AN / AThe indicator is relevant because it provides information on the appointmentsThe update of the indicator results from the site feedNumber of Women Ministers, Governors, Municipal Administrators divided by the total number of Municipal Ministers, Governors or Administrators, multiplied by 100N / AAvailable at national level (Ministries; Governors; Municipal administrators)N / AGovernment website
